articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Jon Meacham: This week proved James Madison is more durable than Twitter
articles.description: Noting that Republicans on the Hill voted against the president three separate times this week, Jon Meacham says it shows members of his party will serve as a check on the president.
